name: CITY BALLS VR
description:
One of the first jump´n´run games exclusively made for your VR experience.
Jump from rooftop to rooftop and overcome the hurdles.
Exciting tasks are waiting for you.
The time is your enemy - beat the best time with speed and find new ways to reach the finish line even faster.
In 5 action-packed levels you'll find games like baseball, mini golf, basketball, archery and much more!
The tasks become more challenging from level to level.
The height and variety of this game makes it a must have for your Virtual Reality glasses.
